name: 026 Ghost Production
description:
" I wanted to use Ghost Story in this project ( a realtime visual setup made for a unofficial visualizer that I never released ) cause I had the feeling that all the shots randomized would get an amazing feeling of the movie. Contemplative mood of life, what's life, how do we understand and live with a loss. I love this film (not as mush as Arthur btw). "

Ambers of The Realtime [19-27] : The Ghost series
